EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202310-HHS-INP-ANCC-Magnet-Pathway-2023.01b - Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at the ANCC National Magnet Conference for a deep dive into virtual nursing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT Increase efficiency and staff satisfaction ANCC National Magnet Conference® October 12-14 Chicago, IL Of all the innovations you’ll see at the ANCC National Magnet Conference, make our inpatient virtual nursing solution your top priority. - Meet us at booth #1017 <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/ancc-magnet-pathway-2023?month=2023-10]]> to learn how our virtual nursing solution is addressing staff challenges while increasing nurse satisfaction - Attend our speaking session Friday, October 13 at 1:15 p.m. at Presenters Theatre to hear about the success our clients are experiencing with virtual nursing - Get a head start on the conversation by exploring these resources <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/virtual-nursing/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=EM-202310-HHS-INP-MAGNET-2023&utm_campaign_id=hhs-2023]]>
73% reduction based on client data About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
